overview: Brainy Baby is university studied and published in JOCAM Journal of Children and Media. Children love Brainy Baby DVDs and parents tell us their children love to watch them again and again learning something new each time. Brainy Baby English teaches basic first words to preschoolers using everyday objects in familiar surroundings to make fast learning connections. Interactive DVD feature live action and real children. More than 50 words such as colors, numbers, favorite objects, action words, and familiar phrases are introduced by a native English language narrator. Your child will hear lively music with a gentle, instructional voice describing what your child is seeing. Lessons use the teach repeat review method throughout.
tagline: Brainy Baby Teach Your Child English: Learning First Words
title: Brainy Baby: English
